index.title: Angular Docs

index.banner: The latest Angular release is 4.0. Learn about the latest updates to the documentation. View the Angular change log for enhancements, fixes, and breaking changes in Angular itself. If you’re looking for Angular v2 documents, you’ll find them at v2.angular.io.
